original_info.name: Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers: Bonus Material

review.name: the most tiresome pile of she-height ever made
review.reviewBody: there was no story, it makes me angry that anyone could even bother with this. peter jackson has proved his direness. i slept for 30 minutes in this film and missed nothing because there was nothing, is nothing in this film. the only other film i have slept in was 'Arthur 2 love on the rocks' i need say no more? i will, grasping for Star Wars. why did no one save gandolf ? there was no threat to him; maybe because O-be-one died about then. god i hate it.
